AJp.caption: Unique name
AJp.doc: The unique name of the marker that you want to change its icon.
AJp.name: marker_name

AJr.caption: Use custom icon?
AJr.doc: Allows you to upload your own .png image to be used as an icon or marker instead of the default marker. You can optionally upload a .png image to be the icon shadow if you want to, but it's not necessary.  Only use Icons for custom markers with aspect ratio 1:1, that is, images that are squared, otherwise the images will be distorted.
AJr.name: use_custom_icon

AJs.caption: Custom icon image
AJs.doc: Your own .png image to be used as an icon or marker instead of the default marker. You can optionally upload a .png image to be the icon shadow if you want to, but it's not necessary.  Only use Icons for custom markers with aspect ratio 1:1, that is, images that are squared, otherwise the image will be distorted.
AJs.name: custom_icon_url
